ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..
ygData.msgSnippet: Frankly I don t see what your point is.  You report that your account has been compromised and they will temporarly ban the account so no further possible
ygData.messageBody:
Frankly I don't see what your point is. You report
that your account has been compromised and they will
temporarly ban the account so no further possible
damage can be done. To be honest, how many accounts
have been compromised.. that aren't caused by players
handing out their account information to "so called"
friends in the game? This is not a flame.. It's only
meant as a reminder - this is a personal responsiblity
of all players. In my 2+ years playing this game, I
have witnessed only one so called compromise. It
involved a player handing out his information to a
friend. How many of us lend our car keys out to
people we have merely met over the phone? =)

Just keep your information under guard and you most
likely will never have this issue.

DuHase.. Outrider of Saryrn
